front.title: Routing Header Based BIER Information Encapsulation

abstract.t: This draft proposes one new encapsulation schema of Bit Index Explicit Replication (BIER) information to transfer the multicast packets within the IPv6 network. By defining a new IPv6 Routing Header type, it keeps the original source address and destination address unchanged in forwarding process. The encapsulation schema can make full use of the existing IPv6 quality assurance methods to provide high-quality multicast service.
